Posts.Content: Imtweedles wrote: I am 54 years old and was just diagnosed with DCIS. I have two choices now, radiation or mastectomy. I am not sure which one to have. Any suggestions? I also have to have the sentinel node biopsy. Dx 1/4/2010, DCIS, Stage 0, Grade 1 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Radiation or mastectomy Imtweedles finola
